title: Mormugao Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 84 Apprentice Posts
description: The Morumugao Port Trust has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 84 Trade Apprentice, Graduate Apprentice, and Technician Apprentice Posts. The interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ 10th pass, ITI, 12th, Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical Engineering can apply for the Murmugao Port Trust Recruitment 2025.
